subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Portugal dominated its fifth European Championship quarterfinal in a row, and while the Czech held on bravely in Warsaw, Cristiano Ronaldo powered home a superb header for the 1-0 victory.
snippet: Portugal dominated its fifth European Championship quarterfinal in a row, and while the Czech held on bravely in Warsaw, Cristiano Ronaldo powered home a superb header for the 1-0 victory.
